submittedOn.description: The date the savings income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

securities.description: The container that holds the key value for securities

taxTakenOff.description: The amount of tax deducted from Gilt Edge interest. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

grossAmount.description: The gross amount of Gilt Edge interest, securities, and accrued income profits including tax deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netAmount.description: The amount of Gilt Edge interest after tax has been deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: Financial details about foreign interest income

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount of income, in UK pounds, before any foreign tax has been deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOff.description: The total amount of foreign tax taken off your income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTax.description: The total amount of Special Withholding Tax (SWT) (in UK pounds) and any UK tax deducted from the foreign income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether foreign tax credit relief has been claimed. The value must be true or false

taxableAmount.description: The total taxable amount on dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
